MetricReportDefinition.description: The MetricReportDefinition schema describes set of metrics that are collected into a metric report.
MetricReportDefinition.longDescription: This resource shall specify a set of metrics that shall be collected into a metric report in a Redfish implementation.

title: #MetricReportDefinition.MetricReportDefinition
